segments.text: I notice the woman so focused on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink is overflowing, and she's in the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are risking everything for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks dangerous; he could get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits patiently, but it's all so precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No one's aware of the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This peaceful kitchen hides so much potential harm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems worlds away from this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the mom; she'll be upset later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage will be a big problem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids' excitement might end in tears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame such a normal moment turns risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets frame their innocent mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR
